languages.text: [О неподъемном долге перед Ним, что искупит лишь служение и смерть — плата за победу Человечества в вечной войне]
[Thoughts of {mf|his|her} monumental duty to the Emperor. Such duty can only be fulfilled through service and death, for such is the price of Humanity's victory in the everlasting war]
languages.original_text: [О неподъемном долге перед Ним, что искупит лишь служение и смерть — плата за победу Человечества в вечной войне]

traits.locale_text: [Thoughts of {mf|his|her} monumental duty to Him, one that can only be fulfilled through service and death, for such is the price for Humanity's victory in the everlasting war]
[Thoughts of {mf|his|her} monumental duty to Him, one that can only be fulfilled through service and death, for such is the price for Humanity's victory in the everlasting war]

[Thoughts of {mf|his|her} monumental duty to the Emperor. Such duty can only be fulfilled through service and death, for such is the price of Humanity's victory in the everlasting war]

languages.text: [Votre devoir monumental envers l'Empereur. Il ne peut être accompli qu'à travers le service et la mort, car tel est le prix de la victoire de l'humanité dans cette guerre sans fin]
languages.original_text: [Thoughts of {mf|his|her} monumental duty to the Emperor. Such duty can only be fulfilled through service and death, for such is the price of Humanity's victory in the everlasting war]

traits.locale_text: [Votre devoir monumental envers l'Empereur. Il ne peut être accompli qu'à travers le service et la mort, car tel est le prix de la victoire de l'humanité dans cette guerre sans fin]

languages.text: [Pensamientos sobre su deber monumental hacia el Emperador. Dicho deber solo se puede cumplir con el servicio y la muerte, pues tal es el precio de la victoria de la Humanidad en su guerra eterna]
languages.original_text: [Thoughts of {mf|his|her} monumental duty to the Emperor. Such duty can only be fulfilled through service and death, for such is the price of Humanity's victory in the everlasting war]

traits.locale_text: [Pensamientos sobre su deber monumental hacia el Emperador. Dicho deber solo se puede cumplir con el servicio y la muerte, pues tal es el precio de la victoria de la Humanidad en su guerra eterna]

languages.text: [你的脑海中浮现出对帝皇的重大责任。只有通过侍奉与死亡，才能完成对帝皇的责任，因为人类若是想在这场永恒的战争中获得胜利，这是必须付出的代价]
languages.original_text: [Thoughts of {mf|his|her} monumental duty to the Emperor. Such duty can only be fulfilled through service and death, for such is the price of Humanity's victory in the everlasting war]

traits.locale_text: [你的脑海中浮现出对帝皇的重大责任。只有通过侍奉与死亡，才能完成对帝皇的责任，因为人类若是想在这场永恒的战争中获得胜利，这是必须付出的代价]

languages.text: [皇帝への{mf|彼|彼女}の義務を振り返る。このような義務は、奉仕と死を通じてのみ果たすことができる。それが、永遠の戦争における人類の勝利の代償だからだ］
languages.original_text: [Thoughts of {mf|his|her} monumental duty to the Emperor. Such duty can only be fulfilled through service and death, for such is the price of Humanity's victory in the everlasting war]

traits.locale_text: [皇帝への{mf|彼|彼女}の義務を振り返る。このような義務は、奉仕と死を通じてのみ果たすことができる。それが、永遠の戦争における人類の勝利の代償だからだ］

languages.text: [Gedanken zu {mf|seiner|ihrer} monumentalen Pflicht dem Imperator gegenüber. Eine solche Pflicht lässt sich nur durch Dienst und Tod erfüllen, denn dies ist der Preis für den Sieg der Menschheit im ewigen Krieg.]
languages.original_text: [Thoughts of {mf|his|her} monumental duty to the Emperor. Such duty can only be fulfilled through service and death, for such is the price of Humanity's victory in the everlasting war]

traits.locale_text: [Gedanken zu {mf|seiner|ihrer} monumentalen Pflicht dem Imperator gegenüber. Eine solche Pflicht lässt sich nur durch Dienst und Tod erfüllen, denn dies ist der Preis für den Sieg der Menschheit im ewigen Krieg.]

languages.text: [İmparator'a karşı muazzam vazifesine dair düşünceler. Böylesi bir vazife, yalnızca hizmet ve ölümle yerine getirilebilir. İnsanlığın ebedî savaştaki zaferinin bedeli budur.]
languages.original_text: [Thoughts of {mf|his|her} monumental duty to the Emperor. Such duty can only be fulfilled through service and death, for such is the price of Humanity's victory in the everlasting war]
